alert.note: Alert for Indiana (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:25PM EDT until June 03 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL INDIANA COUNTY... At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Northern Cambria, or 11 miles east of Indiana, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Indiana, Homer City, Black Lick, Clymer, Chevy Chase Heights, Armagh, Lucerne Mines, Dixonville, Jacksonville, Commodore, Brush Vly, and Yellow Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
